db:abstract.db:para: The ScatterSeries type is used for making scatter charts.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The following QML shows how to create a chart with two simple scatter series:

db:section.db:title: borderWidth : real
db:section.db:para: The width of the border line. By default the width is 2.0.

db:section.db:title: brushFilename : QString
db:section.db:para: The name of the file used as a brush for the series.

db:section.db:title: markerShape : MarkerShape
db:section.db:para: Defines the shape of the marker used to draw the points in the series. One of ScatterSeries ScatterSeries.MarkerShapeCircle or ScatterSeries.MarkerShapeRectangle. The default shape is ScatterSeries.MarkerShapeCircle.

db:section.db:title: markerSize : real
db:section.db:para: Defines the size of the marker used to draw the points in the series. The default size is 15.0.

db:section.db:title: onBorderColorChanged(color color)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the line (pen) color has changed to color.

db:section.db:title: onColorChanged(color color)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the fill (brush) color has changed to color.

db:section.db:title: onMarkerShapeChanged(MarkerShape shape)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the marker shape has changed to shape.

db:section.db:title: onMarkerSizeChanged(real size)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the marker size has changed to size.
